bibl.title: Letter from Walter Reed to Laura Reed Blincoe, April 22, 1902

div1.p: Reed writes that he is glad to hear that his monthly contribution helps.

div1.head: Letter from Walter Reed to Laura Reed Blincoe, April 22, 1902
div1.opener:
D
D
WAR DEPARTMENT,
SURGEON GENERAL'S OFFICE,
ARMY MEDICAL MUSEUM AND LIBRARY,
WASHINGTON.
April 22, '02
My darling Sister:
div1.p:
Glad to
hear that you are all
well & that Laura's
chicks are thriving-
and so glad to know that
the little monthly con-
tribution helps to make
the cook do her work
smoothly- Please send me
Brother Kit's address-
I had a postal from
yesterday, but as it was
only dated St. Louis, it
won't enable me to an-
swer- Is it 303 Commer-
cial Building? I seem
to remember something
like that. A postal
card will answer-
